info.name: DarkTube [2.6] - Youtube Dark
info.description:
This style is lightly inspired by style 33672 but is largely improved:

1. Needs less maintenance if YouTube changes it's configuration slightly (hopefully!).
2. The original YouTube Dark used too many dark elements thereby reducing visibility in some circumstances (buttons, menus, etc.).
3. It's completely cross-browser compatible including css border-radius/box-shadow tags for for each browser that supports such tags.

Big screenshots:
http://i.imgur.com/fKJuT.png
http://i.imgur.com/NL632.png
http://i.imgur.com/NKWbs.png

Opera extensions: https://addons.opera.com/addons/extensions/details/youtube-dark-simplified/
Chrome extension: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/gkkdoohkeppiioiikkkekdbnbkobempe

Question? Feel free to comment on my support page at http://www.cloudstew.com
I read the comments often and respond to bug reports quickly.

Keeping this style up-to-date takes a lot of work! Showing your support would go a long way in keeping me motivated.
info.additionalInfo:
================== Change Log ===================

----------------Version 2---------------------

Version 2.5
- Fixed the search input box that was showing black text against a black background
- New image sprite for new icons!

Version 2.4
- Fixed main sprite image due to Youtube style change.
- Also fixed some minor styles on the video page.

Version 2.3
- Added browsing pages.
- Fixed bugs caused by recent Youtube update.
- Changed name to DarkTube

Version 2.1-2.2
- Minor fixes.

Version 2.0
- By popular request, all of the white coloring has been removed.  The extension is now fully dark and your eyes will be happy.

- Major changes to the layout of all pages.

- Inbox, account pages, search, and special pages now all work.

- TODO: Fix the browsing pages (Oy vey there are a lot of them!)

----------------Version 1---------------------

Version 1.1
- Fixed sidebar when user presses expand button
- Removed extra borders and margins on the video page

Version 1.2 & 1.21
- Added work-around for chrome "box-shadow: inset" bug
- Fixed browse page filtering styles

Version 1.3
- Converted to Opera extension
- Added styles to miscellaneous pages.

Version 1.32
- New icon

Version 1.33
- Fixed bugs on search, browsing, and music pages

Version 1.34
- Fixed search bar bug when browsing Youtube in non-English languages.

Version 1.35
- Fixed overflow bug for user video drop-down on video page.

Version 1.36
- Fixed bugs caused by last update (whoops!).

Version 1.37
- Fixed search page to make viewing links easier.
